entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending before morning then cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 39 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023
